name: Integers k such that there are i groups of order k+i up to isomorphism, for i=1,2,3,4,5.
example: 2814120 is in this sequence as there is 1 group of order 2814121 up to isomorphism, 2 of order 2814122, 3 of order 2814123, 4 of order 2814124, 5 of order 2814125.
author: _Robin Jones_, Apr 19 2025

name: Integers k such that there are i groups of order k+i up to isomorphism, for i=1,2,3.
link: Robin Jones, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..500
example: 72 is in this sequence as there is 1 group of order 73 up to isomorphism, 2 of order 74, 3 of order 75.
author: _Robin Jones_, Jun 12 2024

name: Integers k such that there are i groups of order k+i up to isomorphism, for i=1,2,3,4.
link: Robin Jones, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..118
example: 72 is in this sequence as there is 1 group of order 73 up to isomorphism, 2 of order 74, 3 of order 75, 4 of order 76.
program: (Magma) for x in [1 .. 100000] do //get the terms up to 100000
author: _Robin Jones_, Jun 12 2024
